author: slava77
body:
there are no instances of --customise_unsch so far, which is probably why this was not noticed.
A large fraction of miniAOD definitions are in unscheduled customs calls.
Clearly, to customize on command line one needs to do it after all "official" changes are done.
title: put unscheduled customs in order: external methods done applied after all internal (miniAOD) are done
